descriptionHtml:
Ok so I have downloaded many hot female armors from the nexus, but in the game itself there is not many hot females that can wear them...And here we are , I have made five hot female companions who will fit the armors beautifully. REMEMBER where you dismiss them because there they will stay which is great for players who use custom houses, with condition the house you use  have a good navmesh. All of them are located in whiterun, three in the Bannered Mare and two in the Drunken Huntsman. Their level cap is 70. Elanor and  Lessien are ranger class, Raine is mystic class, Valkyrie is one handed  and Thema is dremora class.

Required  MODS:
ApachiiSkyHair   http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168

Recommended mods :
Better Females by Bella  (options\\no shine)  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812
Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666
Natural eyes high res.  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3589#content

ENJOY...

installation : I recommend that you install manually. Just unzip the files and MOVE\\COPY the DATA folder in your skyrim folder. 
Make sure the HIghFive ESM file is above all ESP files in skyrim launcher.

uninstall : remove HighFive ESM and ESP from data folder
            remove HighFive ESM folder from data\\Meshes\\actors\\character\\facegendata\\facegeom\\
            remove HighFive ESM folder from data\\textures\\actors\\character\\facegendata\\facetint\\

Thanks to all modders mentioned above for making this game more enjoyable.
author: emottt
